items.sentence: I wish I could figure out how to make Tom happy.
I wish I could speak French half as well as you.
Tom went back into the house to get an umbrella.
Tom has no idea how to answer Mary\'s questions.
You\'re just running away from life\'s problems.
You\'re just the person we\'ve been looking for.
If you\'re going to kill me, I want to know why.
Is something wrong with the way I\'m doing this?
Tom told Mary to buy some coffee and cigarettes.
Tom told Mary where she could buy imported wine.
Tom told his cellmate about his plans to escape.
Tom told his son not to eat with his mouth open.
Tom told me he had a few things to take care of.
An enemy of an enemy is not necessarily an ally.
Could you please speak a little bit more slowly?
Do you think we can find someone to replace Tom?
Tom can\'t put up with Mary\'s behavior anymore.
My bicycle cost twice as much as Tom\'s bicycle.
My brain doesn\'t seem to be working well today.
My father doesn\'t let me go out alone at night.
He caught the nine o\'clock shuttle to New York.
He couldn\'t bring himself to believe her story.
He looked refreshed after a good night\'s sleep.
They are afraid that nuclear war will break out.
This book is way more interesting than that one.
This is the most comfortable chair in our house.
This novel has also been translated into French.
This sentence seems to be grammatically correct.
I still can\'t believe this is really happening.
I usually don\'t have time to eat a large lunch.
I know I can trust you to take good care of Tom.
I know Tom and Mary have both agreed to do that.
I know Tom and Mary were more than just friends.
Tom couldn\'t believe that Mary had tricked him.
Tom couldn\'t borrow as much money as he needed.
Tom couldn\'t bring himself to pull the trigger.
Tom couldn\'t convince Mary to accept his money.
Tom couldn\'t do anything about it at that time.
Tom said he would\'ve come if we\'d invited him.
Tom hasn\'t had anything to eat since breakfast.
Tom isn\'t planning to meet Mary at the airport.
Tom isn\'t really going to join the navy, is he?
Tom isn\'t very good at concealing his feelings.
Tom figured out why the machine wasn\'t working.
I can\'t figure out how to operate this machine.
I can\'t help it if girls want to flirt with me.
I can\'t help thinking my father is still alive.
I can\'t kiss you the way you want to be kissed.
I found a diary my father kept for thirty years.
I gave her my word I would be back home by nine.
